quote_first: The chairman dialed seven digits and asked to speak to the duty officer. He checked his watch as he waited to be put through. It was
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: He hurt me to the point where I wanted to tell him something. My watch said
quote_last: now. It had stopped. It was smashed.
title: The Ipcress File
author: Len Deighton
